original_title: ViewSonic launches world’s first professional colour monitor for designers, content creators
original_body_lines: ViewSonic Corp., a leading global provider of visual solutions, has launched the ColorPro VP76 premium monitor series in Sri Lanka, designed for content creators in fields such as photography, design, video editing, and animation.

These monitors offer precise colour accuracy and come equipped with an extended ColorPro Wheel for OSD settings, photo and video editing software, and colour calibration. The monitors are now available for purchase on ViewSonic’s website and flagship store in Sri Lanka.

The ColorPro VP76 Series monitor has received various global awards for its design, user experience, and features, including the iF Design Award 2021, Good Design Award 2021, and Wallpaper Magazine’s inaugural Smart Space Award 2021 for the ‘Smartest Design + Tech Collaboration’ category. Its exclusive ColorPro Wheel, along with other design-enhanced features, provides instant access to editing software, accurate colour calibration, and OSD settings, as well as deeper screen immersion through the detachable Magnetic Shading Hood and built-in ambient backstage light. This makes it a perfect tool for videographers and pro-colourists.

“When it comes to design, colour is king, and calibration is key. We are proud to introduce our flagship model – the ColorPro VP2776, which takes colour accuracy and creator-forward design to the next level,” said ViewSonic Monitor Business Unit General Manager Oscar Lin.  “With its advanced features and pro-creator tools, we aim to be the first choice for professionals and prosumers.”

These monitors are compatible with Mac and VESA DisplayHDR 400 and offer a film-standard wide colour gamut of 98% DCI-P3, which is Pantone-validated. This enables users to view consistent and spectacular colours across different screens. The Nano IPS technology allows for crisp and fine details, even for slow-motion captures. With a fast refresh rate of 165Hz, the VP76 Series is ideal for animators, video editors, and game developers who require accurate colour and smooth visuals for minute edits and movements.

The ColorPro VP76 Series has a 27-inch 4K VESA DisplayHDR 400 Nano IPS display with a resolution of 2560 x 1440. It comes with an exclusive ColorPro Wheel that allows for instant access to compatible Adobe Creative Suite and Capture One editing software, colour calibration, and OSD settings. Other features include a magnetic shading hood and ambient backstage light, professional colour accuracy validated by Pantone, and ICCSync Color Matching Technology. The monitor’s fast refresh rate of up to 165Hz ensures seamless graphics, and the ultimate connectivity is achieved with a 90W USB-C port. Overall, the ColorPro VP76 Series is a top-of-the-line option for content creators who require professional-grade colour accuracy and seamless graphics.
Founded in California, ViewSonic is a leading global provider of visual solutions and conducts business in over 100 countries worldwide.
